name: Shine Bright
description:
This game was created for Brackey's game Jam. (Theme "Stronger Together")

This is a two-player game where both players are glowing balls that shine Brighter together. When they go away from each other for too long there light will burn out and they'll die. Because of this, they need to makes sure not to get too far apart while trying to help each other get through puzzles. 

Controls:

Controllers are recommended but not required.

WASD to move player one

Arrow keys to move player two.
